content.raw:
This could be problematic.  Some of our tasks will require a significant number of instances of the buoyancy plugin.  I’ll try to reproduce.

Could you try modeling the buoyancy of the cylindrical buoy as  a sphere?  I think we want to preserve the ability to run worlds with ~100 buoyant items with a RTF=>1.0.
content.html:
This could be problematic. Some of our tasks will require a significant number of instances of the buoyancy plugin. I’ll try to reproduce.

Could you try modeling the buoyancy of the cylindrical buoy as a sphere? I think we want to preserve the ability to run worlds with ~100 buoyant items with a RTF=>1.0.
